MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL14 postcode area of Wrexham, affecting properties in Trinity Street, Wrexham Road, Spring Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:51pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected as there are further network investigation required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:50pm on 10th March 2021.
